name: Escape to edit
author: Roktopus Industries

sections.description: A very simple time saver. Wherever you are on your site’s front end, hitting ESC will take logged in users straight to the edit page. If you’re looking at a blog or archive, you’ll go to the edit screen for the post currently visible.

short_description: A very simple time saver. Wherever you are on your site's front end, hitting ESC will take logged in users straight to the edit page. If you're looking at a blog or archive, you'll go to the edit screen for the post currently visible.
